mapper.insert: INSERT INTO app_board (title, context, contextId, contextPw, etc, groupId) VALUES (#{title}, #{context}, #{contextId}, #{contextPw}, #{etc}, #{groupId});
mapper.select: SELECT b.id as `id`, context, contextId, contextPw, etc, groupId, g.icon, g.title, g.description FROM app_board as b INNER JOIN app_directory as g ON b.groupId = g.id WHERE g.userId = #{userId} AND b.id = #{boardId}
